verses.verse: וּלְאַחְאָ֛ב <WH256> And Ahab שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> had seventy בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria וַיִּכְתֹּב֩ <WH3789> wrote יֵה֨וּא <WH3058> And Jehu סְפָרִ֜ים <WH5612> letters וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and sent שֹׁמְר֗וֹן <WH8111> to Samaria אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> unto the rulers יִזְרְעֶאל֙ <WH3157> of Jezreel הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> to the elders וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הָאֹמְנִ֥ים <WH539> and to them that brought up אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> Ahab's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> [children] saying

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now כְּבֹ֨א <WH935> cometh הַסֵּ֤פֶר <WH5612> Now as soon as this letter הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> about וְאִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> for בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH113> to you seeing your master's וְאִתְּכֶם֙ <WH854> for הָרֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> [are] with you and [there are] with you chariots וְהַסּוּסִ֔ים <WH5483> and horses וְעִ֥יר <WH5892> city מִבְצָ֖ר <WH4013> a fenced וְהַנָּֽשֶׁק׃ <WH5402> also and armour

וּרְאִיתֶ֞ם <WH7200> Look even out הַטּ֤וֹב <WH2896> the best וְהַיָּשָׁר֙ <WH3477> and meetest מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH113> of your master's וְשַׂמְתֶּ֖ם <WH7760> and set עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> throne אָבִ֑יו <WH1> [him] on his father's וְהִֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and fight עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אֲדֹנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH113> for your master's

וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <WH3372> afraid מְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> greatly מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> greatly וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> Behold two הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> kings לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עָמְד֖וּ <WH5975> stood לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> not before וְאֵ֖יךְ <WH349> how נַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> him how then shall we stand אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> we

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> [of the children] sent אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> over הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> And he that [was] over the house וַאֲשֶׁ֪ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעִ֟יר <WH5892> and he that [was] over the city וְהַזְּקֵנִים֩ <WH2205> the elders וְהָאֹמְנִ֨ים <WH539> also and the bringers up אֶל־ <WH413> to יֵה֤וּא ׀ <WH3058> to Jehu לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> We [are] thy servants אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> we וְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who תֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> all that thou shalt bid אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> to us נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> and will do לֹֽא־ <WH3808> we will not נַמְלִ֣יךְ <WH4427> king אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> us we will not make any הַטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> thou [that which is] good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> in thine eyes עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <WH6213> do

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <WH3789> Then he wrote אֲלֵיהֶם֩ <WH413> about סֵ֨פֶר ׀ <WH5612> a letter שֵׁנִ֜ית <WH8145> the second time לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> to them saying אִם־ <WH518> If לִ֨י אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> you וּלְקֹלִ֣י ׀ <WH6963> unto my voice אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> and you שֹׁמְעִ֗ים <WH8085> If ye [be] mine and [if] ye will hearken קְחוּ֙ <WH3947> take אֶת־ <WH853> רָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> ye the heads אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> persons בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH113> your master's וּבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> and come אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about כָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> this time מָחָ֖ר <WH4279> by to morrow יִזְרְעֶ֑אלָה <WH3157> to me to Jezreel וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> Now the king's שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> [being] seventy אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> persons אֶת־ <WH854> with גְּדֹלֵ֥י <WH1419> [were] with the great men הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city מְגַדְּלִ֥ים <WH1431> which brought them up אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּבֹ֤א <WH935> came הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> And it came to pass when the letter אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> to them that they took אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> and slew שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> seventy אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> persons וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> and put אֶת־ <WH853> רָֽאשֵׁיהֶם֙ <WH7218> their heads בַּדּוּדִ֔ים <WH1731> in baskets וַיִּשְׁלְח֥וּ <WH7971> and sent אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to יִזְרְעֶֽאלָה׃ <WH3157> him [them] to Jezreel

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> And there came הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <WH4397> a messenger וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> and told ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying הֵבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> They have brought רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> the heads בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said שִׂ֣ימוּ <WH7760> Lay אֹתָ֞ם <WH853> שְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> ye them in two צִבֻּרִ֛ים <WH6652> heaps פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> at the entering in הַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> of the gate עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> until the morning

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> And it came to pass in the morning וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> that he went out וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> and stood וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> to all the people צַדִּקִ֖ים <WH6662> Ye [be] righteous אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> you הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold אֲנִ֜י <WH589> I קָשַׁ֤רְתִּי <WH7194> behold I conspired עַל־ <WH5921> against אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> against my master וָאֶהְרְגֵ֔הוּ <WH2026> and slew וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who הִכָּ֖ה <WH5221> him but who slew אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> another

דְּע֣וּ <WH3045> Know אֵפ֗וֹא <WH645> now כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> nothing יִפֹּ֜ל <WH5307> that there shall fall מִדְּבַ֤ר <WH1697> nothing of the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> unto the earth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> concerning the house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> for the LORD עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> hath done אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what דִּבֶּ֔ר <WH1696> [that] which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by עַבְדּ֥וֹ <WH5650> his servant אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Elijah

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> slew יֵה֗וּא <WH3058> So Jehu אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֤ים <WH7604> all that remained לְבֵית־ <WH1004> of the house אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> of Ahab בְּיִזְרְעֶ֔אל <WH3157> in Jezreel וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all גְּדֹלָ֖יו <WH1419> and all his great men וּמְיֻדָּעָ֣יו <WH3045> and his kinsfolks וְכֹהֲנָ֑יו <WH3548> and his priests עַד־ <WH5704> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> without הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <WH7604> until he left ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <WH8300> him none remaining

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> And he arose וַיָּבֹ֔א <WH935> and departed וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> to Samaria ה֛וּא <WH1931> he בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> court עֵ֥קֶד <WH7462> [And] as he [was] at the shearing הָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> of the shepherds בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> in the way

וְיֵה֗וּא <WH3058> Jehu מָצָא֙ <WH4672> met אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֵי֙ <WH251> with the brethren אֲחַזְיָ֣הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said מִ֣י <WH4310> Who אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> and they וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> Who [are] ye? And they answered אֲחֵ֤י <WH251> We [are] the brethren אֲחַזְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH274> of Ahaziah אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> we וַנֵּ֛רֶד <WH3381> and we go down לִשְׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> to salute בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the children הַגְּבִירָֽה׃ <WH1377> of the queen

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said תִּפְשׂ֣וּם <WH8610> Take חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> them alive וַֽיִּתְפְּשׂ֖וּם <WH8610> And they took חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> them alive וַֽיִּשְׁחָט֞וּם <WH7819> and slew אֶל־ <WH413> at בּ֣וֹר <WH953> them at the pit בֵּֽית־ עֵ֗קֶד <WH1044> of the shearing house אַרְבָּעִ֤ים <WH705> and forty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> [even] two אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and he הִשְׁאִ֥יר <WH7604> neither left אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> he any מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like ס

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> had departed מִשָּׁ֡ם <WH8033> there וַיִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> thence he lighted אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹנָדָב֩ <WH3082> on Jehonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רֵכָ֨ב <WH7394> of Rechab לִקְרָאת֜וֹ <WH7125> [coming] to meet וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֗הוּ <WH1288> him and he saluted וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> him and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him הֲיֵ֧שׁ <WH3426> to him Is אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָבְךָ֣ <WH3824> thine heart יָשָׁ֗ר <WH3477> right כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> my לְבָבִי֙ <WH3824> as my heart עִם־ <WH5973> to him לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <WH3824> is your heart וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> answered יְהוֹנָדָ֥ב <WH3082> Jehonadab יֵ֛שׁ <WH3426> It is וָיֵ֖שׁ <WH3426> it תְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> If it be give אֶת־ <WH853> יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> [me] thine hand וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> And he gave יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> [him] his hand וַיַּעֲלֵ֥הוּ <WH5927> and he took him up אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּרְכָּבָֽה׃ <WH4818> to him into the chariot

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said לְכָ֣ה <WH1980> Come אִתִּ֔י <WH854> for וּרְאֵ֖ה <WH7200> with me and see בְּקִנְאָתִ֣י <WH7068> my zeal לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> for the LORD וַיַּרְכִּ֥בוּ <WH7392> So they made him ride אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּרִכְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7393> in his chariot

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And when he came שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> to Samaria וַ֠יַּךְ <WH5221> he slew אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֧ים <WH7604> all that remained לְאַחְאָ֛ב <WH256> unto Ahab בְּשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria עַד־ <WH5704> until הִשְׁמִיד֑וֹ <WH8045> till he had destroyed כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> him according to the saying יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> which he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> to Elijah פ

וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <WH6908> together יֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> And Jehu אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> all the people וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to אַחְאָ֕ב <WH256> unto them Ahab עָבַ֥ד <WH5647> served אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֖עַל <WH1168> Baal מְעָ֑ט <WH4592> a little יֵה֖וּא <WH3058> [but] Jehu יַעַבְדֶ֥נּוּ <WH5647> shall serve הַרְבֵּֽה׃ <WH7235> him much

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now כָל־ <WH3605> all נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> unto me all the prophets הַבַּ֡עַל <WH1168> of Baal כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֹבְדָ֣יו <WH5647> all his servants וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all כֹּהֲנָיו֩ <WH3548> and all his priests קִרְא֨וּ <WH7121> Now therefore call אֵלַ֜י <WH413> about אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> let none אַל־ <WH408> no יִפָּקֵ֗ד <WH6485> be wanting כִּי֩ <WH3588> for זֶ֨בַח <WH2077> sacrifice גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> for I have a great לִי֙ לַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> [to do] to Baal כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִפָּקֵ֖ד <WH6485> whosoever shall be wanting לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יִֽחְיֶ֑ה <WH2421> he shall not live וְיֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> But Jehu עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> did בְעָקְבָּ֔ה <WH6122> [it] in subtilty לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> so הַאֲבִ֖יד <WH6> to the intent that he might destroy אֶת־ <WH853> עֹבְדֵ֥י <WH5647> the worshippers הַבָּֽעַל׃ <WH1168> of Baal
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יֵה֗וּא <WH3058> And Jehu קַדְּשׁ֧וּ <WH6942> Proclaim עֲצָרָ֛ה <WH6116> a solemn assembly לַבַּ֖עַל <WH1168> for Baal וַיִּקְרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> And they proclaimed

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> And Jehu בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> through all Israel וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עֹבְדֵ֣י <WH5647> and all the worshippers הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נִשְׁאַ֥ר <WH7604> left אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> so that there was not a man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֑א <WH935> that came וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> not And they came בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal וַיִּמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> was full בֵית־ <WH1004> and the house הַבַּ֖עַל <WH1168> of Baal פֶּ֥ה <WH6310> from one end לָפֶֽה׃ <WH6310> to another

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said לַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> charge הַמֶּלְתָּחָ֔ה <WH4458> unto him that [was] over the vestry הוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> Bring forth לְב֔וּשׁ <WH3830> vestments לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> for all עֹבְדֵ֣י <WH5647> for all the worshippers הַבָּ֑עַל <WH1168> of Baal וַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> And he brought them forth לָהֶ֖ם הַמַּלְבּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH4403> vestments

וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <WH935> And when they went in לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> to offer זְבָחִ֣ים <WH2077> sacrifices וְעֹל֑וֹת <WH5930> and burnt offerings וְיֵה֞וּא <WH3058> Jehu שָׂם־ <WH7760> appointed ל֤וֹ בַחוּץ֙ <WH2351> without שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <WH8084> fourscore אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> [If] any אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִמָּלֵט֙ <WH4422> escape מִן־ <WH4480> any הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> of the men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I מֵבִ֣יא <WH935> whom I have brought עַל־ <WH5921> into יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3027> into your hands נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> [he that letteth him go] his life תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> exchange נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> [shall be] for the life
